title: SHOPKEEPER无法用CITIZEN插件修改皮肤。
author: 宝藏猎人
txt_content:
用shopkeeper npc创建一个村民，可以用NPC命令修改他的属性，但是不能修改皮肤，显示
the npc can not be the mob type villager for that command

replies.author: 【捣蛋】
replies.txt_content: shopkeeper只能更换村民的职业，无法更换皮肤

replies.author: MC_Shenfeng
replies.txt_content:
选择后/npc type player
然后/npc skin ID即可
